name: User wants to increment the quantity of a product in the cart by 1

steps.name: Given user searches for cleansing product
When user clicks on Add to Cart
And the cart side bar opens
And the user increments the quantity by 1
Then verify that the product quantity is set to 2
Then verify that price has doubled by 2

fullName: Users can navigate to the product page and click add to cart: User wants to increment the quantity of a product in the cart by 1

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Users can navigate to the product page and click add to cart
